comment: I took her for EDUC 7707. The workload was not terrible, very expected for the masters program. Professor Adams was not extremely detailed which made things confusing. She would take a day or two to answer emails and most of the time did not answer the question being asked. Overall not the worst professor but I have had much better through KSU.

Dr. Adam's was great. Sometimes her lessons did get boring but a lot of the time she had hands-on activities for us. Her way of teaching us how to teach our future students was through modeling. Her class was easy because it was all activities that we could do for our elementary students in the future. She always put grades in quickly. Take her!!

Easy class but I feel like I was taking a history class rather than a class that is supposed to help us teach our future students. it is December and she has yet to grade any of my projects. you are only able to miss two classes and rarely ends early. if you want an easy class I would take her but if you want to learn I don't recommend.

I love this woman. I have ABSOLUTELY no idea why her rating is so low???!!! Literally one of the best professors I have ever had. She genuinely wants you to succeed and have a good experience. She's aware of the stresses you'll face in the education program and she's very accommodating because of that. She's so smart, kind, and flexible.

Took her for classroom management. Class is designed to be long, but she makes the time worthwhile. Gives you a worksheet to do during class with an agenda for the day and engagement questions. Very well organized. The only gripe is that there is a ticket-in every week that has questions from the readings in the textbook.

People are harsh on here about professor Adams but she is by far one of the best professors I have had. (my entire class agrees) She is lenient on attendance and turning work in. She is an extremely understanding human when it comes to being sick or mental health related issues. (I had her for my ECE 4465 8am & am taking her again for ECE 4403)
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Graded by few things

comment:
ECE 4465 (wasn't an option)
I LOVE Dr. Adams. I have her for my 8 am. She makes class fun and engaging and puts puzzles and doodle spaces on our class notes. I don't know why her reviews suck, but she deserves much better. If your class is engaged, you all will be amazing. She loves her job and is so knowledgeable about exactly what we need.

Absolutely terrible. Grades very harshly and is solely based on her opinion. Does not stick to rubrics and grades a lot based on her beliefs and point of view rather than the content submitted. Assignments are complete busy work for a graduate level course. 

Choose another professor!!!

Professor Adams doesnt even understand her own rubric and grades based on whether she thinks you did well or not. Her grading is very in consistent and when emailing her about some grades that I do not have in she never responded. Class BORING, Points off if you miss class for any reason (including drs note), lesson plan graded ridiculously
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Left this class more confused than when I started. She grade lesson plans way hard/differently than any other professor. She also was very opinionated on how we should teach social studies but she was so boring. Same white and black powerpoint everyday. She also talked so quiet that I could never understand what she was saying. Take anyone else

Dr. Adams would spend the entire class doing activities that did not benefit us at all. I walked out of her class more stressed about teaching Social Studies because I did not learn how to. She also only really focused on upper grades instead of the lower grades.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: she is SO boring, she takes up the whole class time with actvities that dont help me become a better social studies teacher, we do activities as if we were the students instead of learning about teaching social studies, grades lesson plans thoroughly but tougher than any other professor ive ever had, attendance is a grade
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Adams is very nice. However, her grading is so tough. She gives you corrections and allows you to fix them, but when i fixed them (exactly what she said) i still didnt get a grade i was hoping for. I feel as if Adams expects too much of us when all she does is read off a PowerPoint. I got an A in the class but it definitely was not fun.

She is a hard grader, has boring content, and Im convinced that she doesnt actually know the K-5 standards based on her feedback. Her grading criteria is really unclear, she ignores student answers, and her ticket in the door activities are needlessly complicated. Save yourself stress and dont take her. Take literally anybody else.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Tough grader

comment: For someone who has a lot of opinions about the resources teachers use and how they use them, she sure puts on the most boring presentation of the information for this class. White powerpoint with black font. EVERY DAY. She grades the tickets in the door ridiculously hard for something that we are supposed to be able to do when we get there. BEWARE
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: I had her for 4475. she is seriously one of the most boring professors I have had at KSU. I heard so many good things about how amazing this course was and I was so disappointed that my only option was to have her as my professor. The material in the course was interesting, but her presentation was awful. I dont recommend taking a course with her

I love Professor Adams!!! She's seriously one of the best professors I've had at KSU. She's really good at teaching the material, and you can tell she's passionate about what she's teaching. Plus she's a fairly easy grader which is always a plus! You can tell she reads your stuff though, because her feedback is usually really good.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Would take again

comment: Dr. Adams is a great professor!! Only have to complete 6/14 reading responses throughout the semester. Her class really prepared me to be a teacher! I've heard some people say she is boring and her class is useless but I just don't think they're paying attention! She is a great resource for teaching strategies and knowledge!

Dr. Adams is a great professor! I would take her again if I could. She definitely knows what she is talking about and brings a lot of knowledge and experience into the classroom. Dr. Adams provides lectures that are beneficial and offers students resources to use in their future classrooms. Take her if you have the chance!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria
